title: API Gateway and Functions on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
description: Getting started with API Gateway on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure. Use API Gateway to expose a stock response and an HTTP Backend. Then also use API Gateway to expose Serverless Functions on OCI.

steps.title: Step 1 - Prepare Fn and OCI CLI
Step 2 - Create your first API Deployment
Step 3 - Expose a Function in the API Deployment
